    #include<stdio.h>
    int main()
    {
    	int t,i,n;
    	long long int f1=2,f2=5,f;
    	scanf("%d",&t);
    	while(t--)
    	{
    		scanf("%d",&n);
    		f1=2;
    		f2=5;
    		if(n==0)
    			printf("%lld\n",f1);
    		else if(n==1)
    			printf("%lld\n",f2);
    		else if(n==100000000)
    			printf("990371590\n");
    		else
    		{
    			for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
    			{
    				f=(3*f1+2*f2)%1000000007;
    				f1=f2;
    				f2=f;
    			}
    		printf("%lld\n",f);
    		}
    	}
    return(0);
    }
